name: maplibre-theme-private
description: CSS Themes for your Maplibre GL Js Web app

scripts.dev: postcss --watch -d dist src/core.css src/legacy.css src/classic.css src/modern.css --ext .scoped.css --env scoped
scripts.build:scoped: postcss -d dist src/core.css src/legacy.css src/classic.css src/modern.css --ext .scoped.css --env scoped
scripts.build:base: postcss -d dist src/core.css src/legacy.css src/classic.css src/modern.css --env base
scripts.build: pnpm build:scoped && pnpm build:base && pnpm build:icons && node generate-public-package.js

author: Hugues Tavernier
